name: Premium Editorial
description: Elegant and airy magazine-style UI focused on reading and typography.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Content is king. Typography-first design with generous whitespace. Sophisticated and timeless.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Monochrome (Black/White) with subtle cool gray/blue accents. Avoid loud colors.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Serif headings and body text. No border-radius on images or cards. Minimalist lines and borders.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: High contrast ratio for reading comfort.
